project.description: Report of markers and features that have coordinates on older assemblies (GRCv10, GRCz10, GRCz11, Zv9) but do not yet have GRCz12tu coordinates.

hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
#!/bin/bash # Summary stats for markers/features needing GRCz12tu liftover
echo "" echo "=== Summary of entities needing GRCz12tu coordinates ===" echo ""
psql $DBNAME <<'SQL' SELECT sfclg_assembly AS "Old Assembly", to_char(count(distinct sfclg_data_zdb_id), 'FM999,999') AS "Distinct Entities" FROM sequence_feature_chromosome_location_generated old WHERE sfclg_assembly IS DISTINCT FROM 'GRCz12tu' AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM sequence_feature_chromosome_location_generated new WHERE new.sfclg_data_zdb_id = old.sfclg_data_zdb_id AND new.sfclg_assembly = 'GRCz12tu' ) GROUP BY sfclg_assembly ORDER BY sfclg_assembly; SQL
echo "" echo "=== Breakdown by assembly and entity type (>= 500 entities) ===" echo ""
psql $DBNAME <<'SQL' SELECT sfclg_assembly AS "Assembly", CASE get_obj_type(sfclg_data_zdb_id) WHEN 'ALT' THEN 'ALT (features)' ELSE get_obj_type(sfclg_data_zdb_id) END AS "Type", to_char(count(distinct sfclg_data_zdb_id), 'FM999,999') AS "Count" FROM sequence_feature_chromosome_location_generated old WHERE sfclg_assembly IS DISTINCT FROM 'GRCz12tu' AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM sequence_feature_chromosome_location_generated new WHERE new.sfclg_data_zdb_id = old.sfclg_data_zdb_id AND new.sfclg_assembly = 'GRCz12tu' ) GROUP BY sfclg_assembly, CASE get_obj_type(sfclg_data_zdb_id) WHEN 'ALT' THEN 'ALT (features)' ELSE get_obj_type(sfclg_data_zdb_id) END HAVING count(distinct sfclg_data_zdb_id) >= 500 ORDER BY count(distinct sfclg_data_zdb_id) DESC; SQL

email.subject: $PROJECT_DEFAULT_SUBJECT
email.body: ${SCRIPT,template="report-and-error-log.template"} See report on Jenkins dashboard: ${BUILD_URL}

email.subject: $PROJECT_DEFAULT_SUBJECT
email.body: ${SCRIPT,template="report-and-error-log.template"} See report on Jenkins dashboard: ${BUILD_URL}
